titles.title: Corporate Governance Fairness Act
A bill to amend the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 to require proxy advisory firms to register as investment advisers under that Act, and for other purposes.
Corporate Governance Fairness Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Corporate Governance Fairness Act
This bill requires proxy advisory firms to register as investment advisers with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
